contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 2014 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Third Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-third-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Contest moved from Blaenavon Workmens' Hall to Merthyr Tydfil Leisure Centre.
Best Instrumentalist: Nanette Jones (cornet) - Ebbw Valley Best Horn Section: Ebbw Valley Youngest Player in Third & Fourth Sections: Eleri Kinsey (aged 10) - Upper Rhondda
2014: Welsh League Champion: Ebbw Valley Runner-Up: Oakdale
March 19, 2014, 6:59 p.m. Nov. 25, 2014, 9:42 a.m.
1 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter Symphony for Brass [arr. Hopkinson]
2 Abertillery & District Youth Joshua Ruck Olympus
3 Upper Rhondda Brass Band David Langley Dimensions
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones Clouds
5 Oakdale Silver Band Adrian Browning
6 Severn Tunnel Band Christopher Bond
